description: '''The Imperials''' is an American [[contemporary Christian music]] group that has been active for over 60 years. Originating as a [[southern gospel]] quartet, the innovative group would become pioneers of [[contemporary Christian music]] in the 1960s. There have been many changes for the band in membership and musical styles over the years. They would go on to win four [[Grammy Awards|Grammys]], 15 [[GMA Dove Award|Dove Awards]], and be inducted into the [[Gospel Music Hall of Fame]].
